title: Coordination engineering with crown ethers for perovskite precursor stabilization and defect passivation
content:
Energy Environ. Sci., 2024, Advance Article
DOI: 10.1039/D4EE02124J, Paper
Zhongyang Zhang, Yuxuan Yang, Zijian Huang, Qiaoling Xu, Siyuan Zhu, Minghua Li, Peng Zhao, Hong Cui, Sihan Li, Xi Jin, Xiaoxue Wu, Mingyue Han, Yu Zhang, Ningjiu Zhao, Chao Zou, Qijie Liang, Lede Xian, Jinsong Hu, Cheng Zhu, Yihua Chen, Yang Bai, Yujing Li, Qi Chen, Huanping Zhou, Bao Zhang, Yan Jiang
A perovskite precursor stabilization and defect passivation strategy is developed by coordination engineering with a series of structurally similar crown ethers.
To cite this article before page numbers are assigned, use the DOI form of citation above.
